channel.title: Char and Moreinfo problem
channel.description: Has anyone taken the moreinfo and character folders and successfully merged them? If so, could you please explain how. I've spent a ton of time messing with the save and loadgame methods and I've made no progress. Even though what I did seemed like it would work, it still doesn't save the features such as hair color and beard.

item.title: Char and Moreinfo problem
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Has anyone taken the moreinfo and character folders and successfully merged them? If so, could you please explain how. I’ve spent a ton of time messing with the save and loadgame methods and I’ve made no progress. Even though what I did seemed like it would work, it still doesn’t save the features such as hair color and beard.

Read full topic
